General.Name: Ningbo Heli Mould Technology Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Ningbo Heli Technology Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells casting molds in China and internationally. It offers die-casting molds, gravity low pressure casting molds, gravity casting molds, molding lines, hot and cold core box molds, and hot forming stamping molds. The company also develops and manufactures aluminum alloy materials. The company was formerly known as Ningbo Heli Mould Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Ningbo Heli Technology Co., Ltd. in June 2021. Ningbo Heli Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Ningbo, China.
